thread.title: Karen S

author: Karen S
title: Karen S
text: This is our 3rd time to use seatcraft chairs thru 4seating for our home theater. The past 2 we used the Catalina chair which we really liked. We had a bit of space issue in our new theater & wanted to also have Red fabric. With the help of Clara whom I called several times in the process of picking she sent me a Quote: to secure the price while she had the fabric sample sent out. Can't wait to see how our 6 red Sienna chairs look in our project. Once again very pleased with dealing with 4seating & Clara's help made the process so simple.
